tool_description: Extracts detailed metadata for specific tables including column definitions, data types, constraints, indexes, and relationships.

database_type.description: Type of database (mysql, postgresql, oracle, sqlserver, sqlite)

table_names.description: List of table names to extract metadata for

include_foreign_keys.description: Whether to include foreign key relationships

include_row_counts.description: Whether to include approximate row counts

error_messages: Connection failed: Verify connection string and database accessibility
Table not found: One or more specified tables do not exist
Permission denied: User lacks SELECT permissions on specified tables
Invalid table name: Table names cannot be empty or contain invalid characters
Too many tables requested: Maximum 100 tables per request
usage: Provide connection details and table_names array. Configure optional flags to include indexes, constraints, foreign keys, and row counts as needed.

column_names.description: All column names across processed tables

data_types.description: All data types found across processed tables

primary_keys.description: Primary key column names for each table

total_estimated_rows.description: Sum of estimated rows across all tables
